name: Advertising Agencies
description: Companies that create and execute advertising campaigns for clients across various media channels, including TV, print, digital, and outdoor.

name: Media Buying and Planning
description: Firms that specialize in purchasing and strategizing ad space across media platforms to maximize client reach and ROI.

name: Digital Marketing Agencies
description: Agencies that focus on online marketing services, including search engine optimization, pay-per-click advertising, social media management, and email marketing.

name: Content Creation and Production
description: Companies that develop and produce engaging content, such as videos, images, and written copy, for use in advertising and marketing campaigns.

name: Public Relations and Communications
description: Firms that specialize in managing reputation, building brand awareness, and crafting messaging for clients through media relations, crisis communications, and more.

name: Experiential and Event Marketing
description: Agencies that design and execute immersive brand experiences, including events, activations, and sponsorships, to engage target audiences.

name: Market Research and Analytics
description: Companies that provide data-driven insights and analysis to help clients understand their target audience, track market trends, and measure campaign effectiveness.

name: Outdoor and Out-of-Home Advertising
description: Firms that specialize in creating and executing advertising campaigns in public spaces, including billboards, transit shelters, and mall displays.

name: Print and Publishing
description: Companies that produce and distribute printed materials, such as magazines, newspapers, and catalogs, for advertising and marketing purposes.

name: Radio and Audio Advertising
description: Firms that create and execute audio-based advertising campaigns, including radio spots, podcasts, and streaming audio ads.

name: Television and Video Advertising
description: Companies that produce and air television commercials, as well as create video content for online and social media platforms.

name: Social Media and Influencer Marketing
description: Agencies that specialize in creating and executing social media campaigns, including influencer partnerships, content creation, and community management.

name: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and Search Engine Marketing (SEM)
description: Firms that optimize website content and structure to improve search engine rankings and execute paid search advertising campaigns.

name: Email and Mobile Marketing
description: Companies that create and execute targeted email and mobile campaigns to reach customers and drive conversions.

name: Branding and Design
description: Agencies that develop and refine brand identities, including logos, typography, and visual systems, to create a cohesive brand image.
